description: This file defines a function to fetch top HackerNews stories, creates a context-aware agent using the 'Agent' class, and demonstrates its usage to summarize trending stories. It integrates external APIs and models for real-time data processing.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing a context-aware agent capable of processing and responding based on provided context and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model used within the agent for generating responses.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches the top stories from HackerNews and returns them as a formatted JSON string.
